function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'bar' to reach function 'main'?
Is it impossible for function 'larger' to reach function 'foo'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i < 10' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i < 10' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'j < 5' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'j < 5' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < 10' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j < 5' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Is variable 'id (line 2)' used after its definition?
Does the value assigned to 'c (line 3)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Is variable 'i (line 5)' live at the end of function 'foo'?
Does variable 'j' remain in use at the end of function 'foo'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'x *= x;' be considered dead code?
